column5: Hi all,  Winter came with a bang this year, temps below zero the norm day and night whereas as last week i was soaking up rays in the boat on mirror waters.  Luckily i winterized the boat, just didn't get it in the garage before the snow came......ooooops!  Anyways...woke up yesterday morning to a snow covered landscape......my boy was too young to remember snow so he had a blast discovering snow for the first time so to speak.............                 After a morning of fun with Jack.....the lad wolfed down a HUGE lunch and was definitely the exausted side of tired by 1pm. Jack and Mum headed for a nap and i headed to catch supper.....i only had an hour but the lake i was at is only a few minutes up the road....and i usually stretch an hour  I think i wasted the first 20 minutes using my sinker and floating jig set up, because as soon as i changed to a oddball jig and large sucker minnow the bites were fast and furious. If i hadn't missed as many bites as i did i would have had 4 on the stringer no probs....but luckily the 2 i kept were 17" and 20"......more than enough for our feed!  The small minnow ponds and lakes that are sheltered are already froze over.....i'll be firing up the auger for real by 1st week of December, possibly earlier.   <object width="480" height="385"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p9zuDj-bb4s?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param'>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p9zuDj-bb4s?fs=1&hl=en_US"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p9zuDj-bb4s?fs=1&hl=en_US" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="480" height="385"></embed></object>
excellent report!!! The liitle man seems to be enjoying himself just fine
Seriously...you live in the land of walleye!  I am so pumped for the ice....nice to see the snowy landscape!
I'm suprised that pike had anything but his jaws left over with that hook set  haha. Nice going...you have an enviable diet.

Great report, pics and videos Simon Won't be long now before we see a hard water report from you Snow a bit early up your way this year compared to last?  We still haven't seen any over here yet.... kind of surprising considering deer season being closed now.... usually it starts end of November  Ah well it'll come soon enough I guess Thanks for sharing Jacques
How did you mount the camera on the rood? Very cool effect.
Awesome as always Simon.. Let me know when you want to go fishin!.You live in walleye land dont ya! lol Thanks for sharing, Ron
